value:
Second-rate strategists linger on their
decisions. Take heed of the most
optimal method to win. That's key.

My duty is to support King Garon. I'll
strike down anyone in the way, be
they royal blood or common peasants.

Every plan must include finding the
heart's weakness. Extract a grain of
jealousy so they are consumed by it.

An army of Heroes? Why, I'm
capable alone. With my illusions,
turning the tide of battle is effortless.

Foes whose first instinct is to use
force are easy to conquer, for they
never have a backup plan.

I am Iago, a tactician and illusionist.
Heh. Heh. Don't be suspicious—I am
here for $Nf.
Excellent. Just as I predicted.
Well? Did you enjoy my illusions?
W-what? This wasn't in the plan!

Ah, yes. This will polish my schemes
even further.

I am Iago, a tactician for the Kingdom
of Nohr. Pleased to meet you. Bear
witness to my schemes and illusions.

Greetings. May I have a moment of
your time, $Nu?$k$pBy my thorough evaluations, I've
come to see that you are far more
than just a mere summoner.$k$pWith your abilities, why, you could
take this world in hand and rule over
its entirety!$k$pYou have other intentions, you say?
Heh. Quite a modest statement. But
my predictions are never wrong.$k$pShould you pursue this path, I shall
make use of my excellent tactician
abilities to aid you... Heh heh heh.
(exertion)
How's that?
(exertion)
It can't be... !
All will witness!
This is just the beginning!
So simple.
Wallow!
My plan was perfect...
*evil snicker*
I am King Garon's greatest tactician—Nohr's dread mage, Iago! The pleasure is all mine.
E-excuse me?! You dare disturb a Nohrian official of my stature?!
I am a master of illusions. Care for a demonstration?
As the king's right hand, I will see his desires fulfilled—no matter the cost.
Corrin—you ever-present thorn. How do you thwart even my best efforts to remove you...
Corrin puts such faith in others... What ridiculous naiveté.
You seem to have a knack for avoiding death. Much like another I know...
As you wish.
Hmph.
Good day.
